  • â€œWhat can be solved by AI systems is really just an input function of whether or not you can specify an objective and search through the space of possible solutions.â€

  • â€œThe more opinionated you get, the faster the cycle continues.â€
  • â€œYour role starts to shift to curating the sort of environment and garden that your software is built from.â€
  • â€œA slop test is better than no test.â€
  • â€œThe limiter is not the capability of the coding agent. The limit is your organization's validation criteria.â€
